y=\left(\frac{x-2.4}{1.37}+1.6\right)^{0.355}\ -\ 1.56

y = ((x - 2.4) / 1.37 + 1.6)**0.355 - 1.56

y=-\frac{0.1}{e^{x^{0.66}-2.8}}+0.075\left(x-0.6\right)-0.24

y = - 0.1/np.exp(x**0.66 - 2.8) + 0.075 * (x - 0.6) - 0.24

y=-\frac{0.1}{e^{\left(x-0.09\right)^{0.74}-2.8}}+0.075\left(x-0.41\right)-0.28

y = -0.1 / np.exp((x - 0.09)**0.74 - 2.8) + 0.075 * (x - 0.41) - 0.28
